scripts.delete:remote: git update-ref -d refs/notes/gitgitgadget && gh repo delete --confirm && git remote remove origin
scripts.create:remote: git switch main && gh repo create -s=. -d="Repo to test with ggguser" --public && git push -u origin main
scripts.recreate: npm run delete:remote && npm run create:remote
scripts.branch:last: git switch -C last && git push -u origin last && git switch main
scripts.branch:dev: git switch -C dev && git push -u origin dev && git switch main
scripts.create:branches: npm run branch:last && npm run branch:dev
scripts.restart: npm run recreate && npm run create:branches && npm run init:user && npm run init:email && npm run secret
scripts.push:update: git switch update-1 && git push --force -u origin update-1
scripts.submit: npm run push:update && npm run pr:create && npm run pr:submit
scripts.test: npm run test:ts && npm run test:js
